variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 10% on the portion of taxable income from $0 up to $11,600. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 12% on the portion of taxable income from $11,601 up to $47,150. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 22% on the portion of taxable income from $47,151 up to $100,525. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 24% on the portion of taxable income from $100,526 up to $191,950. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 32% on the portion of taxable income from $191,951 up to $243,725. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 35% on the portion of taxable income from $243,726 up to $609,350. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 37% on the portion of taxable income from $609,351 and above. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_7 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all seven brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
